A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I did enjoy some of this film but there was a lot that I really hated\, not simply disliked but HATED. Luke has been turned into a morose\, cowardly\, murderous douche-bag who looks like Sam Kinison. Finn is still an unfunny\, bumbling\, coward that brings nothing to the story. Rey's character was improved in my opinion however overall the story is a downer\, the whole side story of Finn and Rose running off to Casino Royale was dull and ultimately stupid\, introducing Benicio Del Toro's character was pointless\, those little pog things were annoying and a vein attempt to create new merchandising for Disney. Snoke and Rey's backstory's being shrugged away as nothing was lazy and... stupid! The space battles were cool but there's little to like in this smelly nugget of sci-fi fantasy. As soon as he shuffles out of this mortal coil Lucas will spin in his grave!
